languages.text: "Мое пребывание на станции было посвящено неустанной подготовке к исполнению моего долга. Астромансия, астрография, нумерология, история Дома и {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, и множество других дисциплин — много лет десятки наставников готовили меня к тому, что предназначено судьбой. А единожды в год на станцию прибывал Великий Регент Ааронто. Он передавал под мое управление свое прекрасное судно, чтобы помимо теории я могла овладеть и практическими аспектами нашего искусства".

traits.locale_text: "Мое пребывание на станции было посвящено неустанной подготовке к исполнению моего долга. Астромансия, астрография, нумерология, история Дома и {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, и множество других дисциплин — много лет десятки наставников готовили меня к тому, что предназначено судьбой. А единожды в год на станцию прибывал Великий Регент Ааронто. Он передавал под мое управление свое прекрасное судно, чтобы помимо теории я могла овладеть и практическими аспектами нашего искусства".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."
languages.original_text: "Мое пребывание на станции было посвящено неустанной подготовке к исполнению моего долга. Астромансия, астрография, нумерология, история Дома и {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, и множество других дисциплин — много лет десятки наставников готовили меня к тому, что предназначено судьбой. А единожды в год на станцию прибывал Великий Регент Ааронто. Он передавал под мое управление свое прекрасное судно, чтобы помимо теории я могла овладеть и практическими аспектами нашего искусства".

traits.locale_text: "My stay at the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of House and the Imperium as well as other disciplines — dozens of instructors were tirelessly preparing me for what the destiny had in store. Regent Aaronto arrived at the station once per year and entrusted his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我在星站上的生活，完全是为了让我为将来的职责做好准备。那么多年来，几十位导师孜孜不倦地传授给我各种知识，天文学、占星术、数字学、家族史、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}历史，以及各种其他学科，让我为自己的命运做好准备。每年阿伦托大摄政王都会来星站一次，将他那艘漂亮的船交给我来指挥，让我有机会将学到的知识付诸实践。”
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: “我在星站上的生活，完全是为了让我为将来的职责做好准备。那么多年来，几十位导师孜孜不倦地传授给我各种知识，天文学、占星术、数字学、家族史、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}历史，以及各种其他学科，让我为自己的命运做好准备。每年阿伦托大摄政王都会来星站一次，将他那艘漂亮的船交给我来指挥，让我有机会将学到的知识付诸实践。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the Imperium as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

languages.text: «Mi estancia en la estación estaba plenamente dedicada a prepararme para mis deberes futuros. Astromancia, astrografía, numerología, las historias de mi casa y del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y numerosas otras disciplinas. Durante años, docenas de instructores me prepararon para mi destino sin descanso. Una vez al año, el gran regente Aaronto venía a la estación. Me cedía el mando de su magnífica nave para que aprendiera los aspectos prácticos de nuestro arte».
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: «Mi estancia en la estación estaba plenamente dedicada a prepararme para mis deberes futuros. Astromancia, astrografía, numerología, las historias de mi casa y del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y numerosas otras disciplinas. Durante años, docenas de instructores me prepararon para mi destino sin descanso. Una vez al año, el gran regente Aaronto venía a la estación. Me cedía el mando de su magnífica nave para que aprendiera los aspectos prácticos de nuestro arte».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ステーションでの生活は、将来の任務のための準備に捧げられました。占星術、天文撮影術、数秘術、我が家と{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の歴史、その他の学問など、何年にもわたり、何人もの教官がたゆまず私の運命に備えてくれました。そして年に一度、グレート・リージェント・アーロントがステーションにやってくるのです。彼が美しき船を私の指揮下に委ね、それによって私は我らの技の実践的な面も習得することができたのです」
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションでの生活は、将来の任務のための準備に捧げられました。占星術、天文撮影術、数秘術、我が家と{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の歴史、その他の学問など、何年にもわたり、何人もの教官がたゆまず私の運命に備えてくれました。そして年に一度、グレート・リージェント・アーロントがステーションにやってくるのです。彼が美しき船を私の指揮下に委ね、それによって私は我らの技の実践的な面も習得することができたのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Aufenthalt auf der Station diente allein dazu, mich auf meine zukünftige Pflicht vorzubereiten. Astromantie, Astrografie, Numerologie, die Geschichten meines Hauses und des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} sowie andere Disziplinen — Dutzende von Lehrern haben mich viele Jahre lang unermüdlich auf meine Bestimmung vorbereitet. Und einmal im Jahr ist der Großregent Aaronto auf die Station gekommen. Er hat sein wunderschönes Schiff meinem Kommando anvertraut, damit ich auch die praktischen Aspekte unserer Kunst meistern konnte."
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Aufenthalt auf der Station diente allein dazu, mich auf meine zukünftige Pflicht vorzubereiten. Astromantie, Astrografie, Numerologie, die Geschichten meines Hauses und des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} sowie andere Disziplinen — Dutzende von Lehrern haben mich viele Jahre lang unermüdlich auf meine Bestimmung vorbereitet. Und einmal im Jahr ist der Großregent Aaronto auf die Station gekommen. Er hat sein wunderschönes Schiff meinem Kommando anvertraut, damit ich auch die praktischen Aspekte unserer Kunst meistern konnte."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mon séjour visait uniquement à me préparer à mon devoir. Astromancie, astrographie, numérologie, l'histoire de ma maison et de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}... Pendant des années, des dizaines d'instructeurs m'ont enseigné quantité de disciplines différentes. Le vénérable régent Aaronto me rendait visite une fois par an. Il me confiait alors le commandement de son magnifique vaisseau pour que j'apprenne également à maîtriser les aspects pratiques de notre art. »
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: « Mon séjour visait uniquement à me préparer à mon devoir. Astromancie, astrographie, numérologie, l'histoire de ma maison et de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}... Pendant des années, des dizaines d'instructeurs m'ont enseigné quantité de disciplines différentes. Le vénérable régent Aaronto me rendait visite une fois par an. Il me confiait alors le commandement de son magnifique vaisseau pour que j'apprenne également à maîtriser les aspects pratiques de notre art. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İstasyonda yaşadığım süre tamamen beni gelecekteki vazifeme hazırlamaya adanmıştı. Yıldızbazlık, astrografya, numeroloji, Hanemin ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} tarihiyle birlikte başka disiplinler... Onlarca eğitmen, beni kaderime hazırlamak için yıllarca didindi. Yüce Naip Aaronto, zanaatımızın pratik yönlerine de hâkim olabilmem için yılda bir kez istasyona gelip o güzel gemisini bana emanet ederdi."
languages.original_text: "My stay on the station was wholly dedicated to preparing me for my future duty. Astromancy, astrography, numerology, the histories of my House and the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as well as other disciplines — for many years, dozens of instructors tirelessly prepared me for my destiny. And once a year, Great Regent Aaronto would come to the station. He would entrust his beautiful vessel to my command so that I could master the practical aspects of our art as well."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonda yaşadığım süre boyunca kendimi tamamen müstakbel vazifeme hazırlanmaya adadım. Yıldızbazlık, astrografya, numeroloji, kendi Hanemin ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un tarihiyle birlikte başka disiplinler... Onlarca eğitmen, beni kaderime hazırlamak için yıllarca didindi. Yüce Naip Aaronto, zanaatımızın pratik yönlerine de hâkim olabilmem için yılda bir kez istasyona gelip o güzel gemisini bana emanet ederdi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
